query.sql: select t.item_id, (10000000 + t.item_id) item_num, t.period_id, t.regist_user_id, (select user_name from sys_user u where u.user_id = t.regist_user_id) regiest_user, t.regist_time, t.exp_time, t.description, p.period_name from exp_item t,exp_period p where t.period_id = p.period_id #AND_CLAUSE#

filter.name: account_id
filter.express: EXISTS (select 1 from exp_item_line l where l.item_id = t.item_id and l.account_id = ${@account_id} )

filter.name: description
filter.express: (t.description like concat('%',${@description},'%') or EXISTS (select 1 from exp_item_line l where l.item_id = t.item_id and l.description like concat('%',${@description},'%')))

query.name: getDeatil
query.sql: select *, (select user_name from sys_user u where u.user_id = t.regist_user_id) add_user, (10000000 + t.item_id) item_num from exp_item t where t.item_id = ${@item_id}

whenSql.executeSql: insert into exp_item( period_id, regist_user_id, regist_time, description, exp_time) values( ${@period_id}, ${@regist_user_id}, now(), ${@description}, ${@exp_time})
